intro: Vellozia schnizleinia var. somalensis, commonly known as the Somali vellozia, is a rare and unique plant native to Somalia. It belongs to the family Xanthorrhoeaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, spirally arranged leaves. The plant typically grows in arid or semi-arid environments, adapting to harsh climatic conditions. Its morphology includes narrow, linear leaves and small, clustered inflorescences. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a vulnerable species.
